titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Ms. Coll. 390 Item 2863: Praśnabhairava

notesStmt.note: Title from line 1. Cf. UPenn Ms. Coll. 390, Item 1782 and Item 1815 (Bhairavapraśna and Praśnabhairava, respectively).
Good condition. One mistake blotched out with white.

Begins: śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ atha praśnabhairava prārambhaḥ nāḍī tu vāmā himadīdhiteḥ syātsyādbhāskarī dakṣiṇanāḍi kā ca candrasya nāḍyām athavārkanāḍyām antaḥ samīraḥ praviśaty avaśya 1
Ends: aṁgasparśapraśnaḥ śiromukhaṁ karṇanetre spṛṣṭvā pṛchati yo janaḥ suvarṇadh

msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts
